goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 564kB)
target: Facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people, including through the implementation of planned and well-managed migration policies
title: Untitled
indicator_name: Number of bilateral agreements signed in the area of labour migration
national_indicator_available: 10.7.2.2 Number of bilateral agreements signed in the area of labour migration
computation_calculations: Number of bilateral agreements in the area of labour migration negotiated and signed with countries of destination of migrant workers.
computation_definitions: Bilateral agreements in the area of labour migration represent tools for regulating circular migration, decreasing irregular migration and protecting migrant workers' rights in the countries of destination. The areas for applying the respective agreements include: (i) ensuring protection of migrant workers' rights and freedoms in line with the legislation of both countries; (ii) promotion of temporary legal work, return and social-economic reintegration of migrant workers; (iii) decreasing negative effects on migrants and their families.
graph_title: 10.7.2.2 Number of bilateral agreements signed in the area of labour migration

source_responsible_monitoring_1: Ministry of Health, Labour and Social Protection
comparison_global: The national indicator covers a part of the areas of the global indicator
